artifacts.name: Ruffles
artifacts.description: Ruffles is a lightweight reliable UDP library.

artifacts.name: ENET
artifacts.description: ENET is a lightweight reliable UDP library written in C.
artifacts.credits: Albin Corén (transport adapter), Stanislav Denisov (fork and C# wrapper), Lee Salzman (original implementation).
artifacts.platform_compatibility_description: Works on Windows, Linux and macOS by default. Other platforms needs native binaries compiled.

artifacts.name: WebSocket
artifacts.description: WebSocket is a standardized, abstracted packet based protocol built on TCP/IP developed for modern web browsers to use.

artifacts.name: LiteNetLib
artifacts.description: LiteNetLib is a light reliable UDP library native to C#.
artifacts.credits: Piotr Kaminski (transport adapter), Ruslan Pyrch (library implementation).
artifacts.platform_compatibility_description: Works on Windows, Linux, macOS, Android, iOS, UWP, and Lumin OS.

artifacts.name: SteamP2P
artifacts.description: SteamP2P is Steams solution for peer-to-peer networking, used with Steamworks.NET.
artifacts.credits: Petter Vernersson (transport adapter), Riley Labrecque (C# wrapper Steamworks.NET), Valve Corporation.
artifacts.platform_compatibility_description: Works on Windows, Linux and macOS. Requires Steamworks.NET to be preinstalled
